item.name: Authentication
item.description: API endpoints for user authentication, including login and logout.

request.description: Authenticate a user and return a token.
Invalidate the user's token and log out.
Returns a list of categories.
Retrieve details of a specific category by its ID.
Update the details of a category by its ID. Only fields provided in the request will be updated.
Delete the category by its ID. This action is irreversible.
Retrieve a paginated list of promotions. Optionally, include related services by using the `include=services` parameter.
Store a new promotion in the system. You must provide a service ID, description, and optionally the expiration date.
Retrieve details of a specific promotion by its ID. Optionally, include the related service by using the `include=services` parameter.

response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "service_id": 10,
  "description": "Discount on spa services",
  "valid_until": "2024-12-31",
  "created_at": "2024-09-15T12:45:32.000000Z",
  "updated_at": "2024-09-15T12:45:32.000000Z",
  "service": {
    "id": 10,
    "name": "Spa Service",
    "category_id": 3,
    "address": "123 Wellness Street",
    "latitude": 34.052235,
    "longitude": -118.243683
  }
}

request.description: Update the details of an existing promotion by its ID. You can update the service ID, description, and expiration date.
Delete a specific promotion by its ID. This action is irreversible.
Retrieve a paginated list of reviews. Optionally, include related services or review authors (users) by using the `include` parameter.
Store a new review for a specific service. You must provide a service ID, user ID, rating, and optionally a comment.
Store a new review for a specific service. You must provide a service ID, user ID, rating, and optionally a comment.
Update the details of an existing review by its ID. You can update the rating, comment, or related service.
Delete a specific review by its ID. This action is irreversible.
Retrieve a paginated list of services. Optionally, include related categories, reviews, or review authors (users) by using the `include` parameter.
Store a new service. You must provide a name, category ID, address, latitude, longitude, and optionally other details.
Retrieve details of a specific service by its ID. Optionally, include related category, reviews, or review authors by using the `include` parameter.
Update the details of an existing service by its ID. You can update the name, address, or other service details.
Delete a specific service by its ID.

query.description: optional Comma-separated list of relations to include. Possible values: services.

request.description: Retrieve a list of subscriptions with optional included relations.
Store a new subscription in the database.

query.description: optional Comma-separated list of relations to include. Possible values: services.

request.description: Retrieve a specific subscription by its ID.
Update the details of an existing subscription by its ID.
Delete a specific subscription by its ID.
